pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 30, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will briefly meet with artists Tegan and Sara to mark the founding day of their Tegan and Sara Foundation, advocating for LGBTQ women and girls.

Closed to media.
